content.question: What is characteristic about the preschool where the speaker volunteered?

choices.label: All of the students help with cleaning.
There are special classes for siblings.
Students of different ages are in the same class.
None of the students have siblings.

content.answer: Students of different ages are in the same class.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
